name: Shinobi United:Guardian
description:
Grand Card Mobile Game! We've created a realistic ninja-themed world for our players. As an adventurer, you will be plunged into the thrilling and dangerous world of the ninjas with other main characters.

[Ninja rally: Assemble an unbeatable team]
Complete various Adventure Quests to gather allies and assemble a powerful team.

[Epic showdowns, fair competition]
In the battle arena, players can participate in real-time 1v1 battles. Beat your opponent in the allotted time to claim victory.

[Real-time battles, ultimate ninja showdowns]
Ninja Wars can erupt anywhere at anytime. Use classic ninja skills to rise to the top in challenging and exciting battles!
